title: Manmohan Singh - Wikipedia
snippet: In 1948 they relocated to Amritsar, where he studied at Hindu College, Amritsar. He attended Panjab University, then in Hoshiarpur, Punjab, studying Economics and got his bachelor's and master's degrees in 1952 and 1954, respectively, standing first throughout his academic career.

title: Manmohan Singh Education: Former PM Schooling, Colleges, Degrees and Academic Achievements
snippet: Singh completed his Master’s degree in Economics from Punjab University in 1954 with excellent results. Dr Manmohan Singh's hunt for knowledge took him to the University of Cambridge in the United Kingdom, where he enrolled at St. John’s College.

title: Dr. Manmohan Singh | Prime Minister of India
snippet: Dr. Singh’s academic credentials were further strengthened by his years on the faculty of Punjab University and the prestigious Delhi School of Economics.

title: What are the educational degrees of former Prime Minister Dr. Manmohan Singh? - Quora
snippet: Manmohan Singh, the ex-Prime Minister of India had attended Punjab University, then in Hoshiarpur, Punjab, studying Economics and got his bachelor's and master's degrees in 1952 and 1954, respectively, standing first throughout his academic career.
